string.value: The letter issued by #o9300351# of the Black Wings... In order to deliver the letter to #p2091007#, you first must win over #p2091005#, who is one of his students. You'd better head over to #b#m925020000##k and start sweet-talking #b#p2091005##k.

You ask nicely if you can see #p2091007#, but #p2091005#'s stance remains the same: NO. That's when you decide to sweeten the pot, as instructed by #p2090004#, by offering healthy items for the body, which worked like magic. You'd better start gathering up some #b#t4000293#s#k.\r\n\r\n#i4000293# #t4000293# #b#c4000293# / 100#k

When you brought the #t4000293#s to him, #p2091005# discreetly told you the way to #m925020000#'s back alley. In front of #m925020000# are a some flags. You need to use the portal under the green flag on the right side to get to #p2091007#.
What do you want here?! This is the Training Center. Keep your attitude in check!\n#b#L0#I'd like to meet Mu Gong. It's very important.#l\n#k

Then you must take on the entire Mu Lung Dojo! Mu Gong is on the very top floor, awaiting challengers!\n#b#L0#Hey, isn't there a way I can see Mu Gong by taking a backalley shortcut or something…?#l\n#k
Nonsense! What are you saying! How dare you suggest such a dastardly way to reach the top! \n#b#L0#One word, Bellflower.#l\n#k
…Hmph...\n#b#L0#Bellflowers. The best thing a body could get.#l\n#k
…No… no… I can't. I can't.\b#b#L0#100 Bellflowers. They're good for the body.#l\n#k

(Whispering) Hey you're really giving me all this, right? And you're sure that this is good for my body? I mean, I want to go get some myself, but I have had no time... Too much work at the Training Center.
(Whispers) So, you're really going to give me all of that? Exactly 100? Yes, 100 Bellflowers! No less!
Hmm. Hmmm.. How dare you try to buy your way to the top!
Ohhhh! Oops, that was too loud. (Whispers) Did you bring what you promised?
Ohhh…hahaha…this…this will make me even stronger than I already am. Hahaha…hey, you're still here?

Oh yes, you wanted to see our master. There's only one way to meet him without having to fight the entire training center and that is to take the shortcut. #bThere are flags outside the Mu Lung Dojo. I'll activate the hidden portal located behind the GREEN FLAG on the RIGHT#k.
(Whispers) Hey, haven't you found #b100 #t4000293#s yet? You're going to keep your promise, aren't you?
